授業目的: Students of chemistry or non-chemistry majors are welcome to take this introductory course of analytical chemistry. In this class, students will learn not only classical methods and their principles but also several practical examples of spectroscopic applications.
到達目標:
Students should be able to know the followings:
(1) Tools of Analytical Chemistry
(2) Classical Methods of Analysis
(3) Electrochemical Methods
(4) Spectrochemical Methods
授業方法: Questions will be given during the class. The link to the online lecture will be released on LUNA in advance.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: final presentation 50%, daily performance and attendance 50%

name: 【511】国際自然科学特殊講義III【分析化学】／Special Lec. in Int'l Natural Sci. III
